text: B. S. Yediyurappa formed his fourth ministry (Council of Ministers) in July 2019 in Karnataka, a state in South India, after the Janata Dal coalition government collapsed due to defections to the BJP. Currently, the ministry has 27 ministers including the Chief Minister.
